name: tab-nap
description: Give your tabs a little nap, as a treat.

scripts.start: npm run babel -- --watch & npm run tailwind -- --watch
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist/TabNap && mkdir -p dist/TabNap && cp -r build lib icon.png icon16.png icon48.png icon128.png manifest.json page.html popup.html offscreen.html offscreen.js dist/TabNap && rm dist/TabNap/lib/react.dev.js dist/TabNap/lib/react-dom.dev.js dist/TabNap/lib/react.prod.js dist/TabNap/lib/react-dom.prod.js
scripts.build: npm run babel && npm run tailwind && npm run dist && cp lib/react.dev.js dist/TabNap/lib/react.js && cp lib/react-dom.dev.js dist/TabNap/lib/react-dom.js
scripts.build:prod: npm run babel && npm run tailwind && npm run dist && cp lib/react.prod.js dist/TabNap/lib/react.js && cp lib/react-dom.prod.js dist/TabNap/lib/react-dom.js
scripts.zip: npm run build:prod && cd dist && rm -f TabNap.zip && zip -r TabNap.zip TabNap/
